column1: A solar flare has wiped out all your tools.
You’ve lost funding for all of the staff that support your scholarly communication services.
All of your tools were purchased by a company whose goals directly conflict with that of your institution’s mission.
You get to hire 3 talented people to support scholarly communications.
You have to switch tools every 6 months.
You have to replace a person every 6 months.
You have to stop offering one service of your choosing.
You have to start offering one new service: what is it, who’s responsible for it, and what tools, if any, support it?
You have to change one service you support.
